about.title: My Journey
about.headline: Transform Your Life,
about.subtitle: From Corporate Burnout to Purpose-Driven Success
story: A decade ago, I was trapped in a soul-crushing corporate routine. Despite external success, I felt empty, disconnected, and far from my true purpose. That rock bottom became my launching pad.

Through intensive personal development, mindfulness practices, and transformative mentorship, I completely reinvented my life and learned how to be happy again. Today, I wake up every day living my passion‚Äîempowering others to discover theirs.
My mission is crystal clear: guide you through your happiness transformation course with proven strategies, unwavering support, and absolute belief in your unlimited potential.
about.philosophy: Every person possesses unlimited potential waiting to be unlocked. My happiness coaching approach synergizes cutting-edge psychology, neuroscience research, and timeless wisdom to create profound, lasting transformation.

stories.name: Sarah Martinez
stories.quote: This happiness coaching program didn't just change my career‚Äîit transformed my entire life. I went from feeling trapped and unfulfilled to launching my dream agency and tripling my income. The confidence and clarity I gained are priceless!

beforeAfter.before: Stuck in corporate role, lacking fulfillment and confidence
beforeAfter.after: Launched 6-figure marketing agency, living with purpose and passion

stories.name: Michael Chen
stories.quote: The mindset work was absolutely game-changing. I finally broke through my limiting beliefs and scaled my business to 7 figures. The strategic frameworks and accountability made all the difference.

beforeAfter.before: Struggling founder dealing with imposter syndrome
beforeAfter.after: Confident CEO leading a thriving 7-figure company

stories.name: Dr. Emily Rodriguez
stories.quote: I discovered my true calling through these transformative sessions. The career clarity program gave me the courage to transition from teaching to coaching. I've never felt more aligned and fulfilled.

beforeAfter.before: Burned-out teacher searching for deeper purpose
beforeAfter.after: Thriving life coach with growing private practice

stories.name: James Thompson
stories.quote: As a C-suite executive, I thought I had it all figured out. This coaching revealed blind spots and helped me become a more authentic, effective leader. My team's engagement scores skyrocketed.

beforeAfter.after: Emotionally intelligent executive inspiring high-performing teams
